entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:48 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saturna Island 12:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

Air Quality Health Index: N/A
